A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Felt more like a marvel movie with star wars characters than a real star wars movie. Still enjoyed it but no where as good as Empire Strikes Back or even Rogue One. Some story elements from force awakens seemed dropped or skipped over or that original plans were scrapped from JJ to Rian. Curious how Rey's parents and smoke background play out with JJ back for 9???   Am interested to see what Rian can do with his own story away from the whiney ass Skywalker's.
